name: Heroes of Rings: Dragons War
description:
Heroes of Rings is a turn-based RPG with hero collection, introducing a unique battle system allowing you to easily develop complex strategies based on the heroes you use, their skills, and the turns left until the enemies attack.

Collect powerful Heroes and customize them with Rings. The rings are special items that can be upgraded, and combined. Equip the right Heroes with the right Rings to unleash their true potential!

Features:
Unique combat system
Engaging PvP modes
Challenging events, weekly and monthly
